title: Bring warmogs back to aram plz
body: Fuck poke comps being even more OP than they already were.

replies.body: Replace it with an item that has a grey health passive.  10 seconds out of combat, it heals X% of your grey health like Pyke/Tahm.

Now they just need to remove clarity so poke comps actually get punished for missing skill shots if they are just spamming spells.

Ok if we bring back Warmog we remove the broken Spirit visage. That should fix it, learn to dodge skillshot and not item abuse? Gotta love fighting a Garen getting hit by 20 skillshots and not dodging a single one and still be healthier than everyone else.

Warmogs was busted before, some tanks like Alistar or Amumu only needed to buy it and become unstoppable. No two ways about it, it needed a change.

But now? Tanks have become garbage tier, alongside stuff like Evelynn and Udyr. Their only play style now is to serve as meatshields and bodyblock stuff for poke comps OR diving machines if the team has weak poke. That's it. They only dive non-stop or serve as buffers for their team.

Before you could go in, make some picks, backout and regen HP, ready for the next fight.
Now, you go in deep, try to soak up as much as you can and try to distract the enemy as much as possible to allow your team to clean up. If you somehow survived the fight, you are now completely useless and you should just dive as soon as possible in order to buy stuff and recover HP.

Warmogs should return, with a nerf that only allows you to regen 60%. Removing it just made poke comps even more obnoxious than they were.

No. The item was fucking cancerous.

It's been in ARAM way too fucking long.

A tank should not be unkillable to any forms of DPS or burst simply because buying one item lets them coast through the entire game, completely shrugging off **all** incoming damage until they run out of turrets or win.

Nobody else gets to heal back *all* of their damage taken while cowering.

Someone didn't read patch notes....it's gone only for the event
It's not about whether or not you can dodge skill shots. If the skill shot champion misses? No negative penalties. If you dodged 10 skill shots? Poke champ can simply try again with no cost.

ARAm is fine without warmogs.

Just because you can't dodge poke or get out of a fight with less than 10% health does not mean it is a good item for the game mode.

It is not needed and never was needed.

I built it on tanks and fighters because it was broken on ARAM and I know it was broken on ARAM.
I hate it when you got that one burst champ who builds it and literally lives forever after that because clarity solves mana problem.

But now poke comps cant build warmogs and heal off all damage while zoning you out of lane.

Tanks/fighters still have options for healing and defense and should be using them. Now Ziggs cant do it as well.
